languages.text: {n}Кибелла молчит. С поджатых губ слетает горькая усмешка.{/n} "Ты"... как странно это звучит, зная, что нас было сотворено множество. Уверен{mf||а} ли ты, что говоришь с той, с кем был{mf||а} близ{mf|ок|ка}? Может, ее тело осталось там, в клетке ксеноса. Где мы умирали и восставали к нечестивой жизни снова и снова..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла молчит некоторое время. Затем с поджатых губ слетает горькая усмешка.{/n} "Ты"... как странно это звучит, зная, что нас было сотворено множество. Уверен{mf||а} ли ты, что говоришь с той, с кем была близка? Быть может, ее тело осталось там, в клетке ксеноса... где мы умирали и восставали к нечестивой жизни, снова и снова..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah says nothing for a while. Then, a bitter chuckle escapes her pursed lips.{/n} "'You'... that sounds so strange, considering how many me's were made. Can you be sure you are talking to the same woman you were close to? For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла молчит. С поджатых губ слетает горькая усмешка.{/n} "Ты"... как странно это звучит, зная, что нас было сотворено множество. Уверен{mf||а} ли ты, что говоришь с той, с кем был{mf||а} близ{mf|ок|ка}? Может, ее тело осталось там, в клетке ксеноса. Где мы умирали и восставали к нечестивой жизни снова и снова..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah says nothing for a while. Then a bitter chuckle escapes her pursed lips.{/n} "'You'... that sounds so strange, considering how many mes were made. Can you be sure you are talking to the woman you were close with? For all you know, you could have left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage. Where we died and rose to profane life over and over again..."

Can you be sure you are talking to the woman you were close with? For all you know, you could have left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage. Where we died and rose to profane life over and over again..."

For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."

{n}Kibellah says nothing for a while. Then, a bitter chuckle escapes her pursed lips.{/n} "'You'... that sounds so strange, considering how many me's were made. Can you be sure you are talking to the same woman you were close to? For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah permanece callada un rato. Luego ríe entre dientes, una fugaz risa amarga que se escapa por sus labios fruncidos.{/n} «"Usted"... qué extraño suena eso, teniendo en cuenta la cantidad de "yos" que se han creado. ¿Está {mf|seguro|segura} de que habla con la misma mujer que conoció? Quizá dejó su cuerpo allí tirado, en la jaula de los xenos, donde tantas veces perecimos y volvimos a levantarnos en una semblanza profana de vida...».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah says nothing for a while. Then, a bitter chuckle escapes her pursed lips.{/n} "'You'... that sounds so strange, considering how many me's were made. Can you be sure you are talking to the same woman you were close to? For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah permanece callada un rato. Luego ríe entre dientes, una fugaz risa amarga que se escapa por sus labios fruncidos.{/n} «"Usted"... qué extraño suena eso, teniendo en cuenta la cantidad de "yos" que se han creado. ¿Está {mf|seguro|segura} de que habla con la misma mujer que conoció? Quizá dejó su cuerpo allí tirado, en la jaula de los xenos, donde tantas veces perecimos y volvimos a levantarnos en una semblanza profana de vida...».

languages.text: {n}キベラはしばらくの間、何も言わずにいた。それから、口をすぼめたまま苦笑を漏らす。{/n}「『あなた』…何人もの私が作られたってことを考えると、すごく奇妙に聞こえるわね。自分が話しているのが、親しくしていた女性と同じ存在だと確信できる？あなたが知っているのは、彼女の遺体をあそこに、異種族の檻の中に放置した。そこで私たちは死んで、何度も何度も冒涜的な生命として蘇った…」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah says nothing for a while. Then, a bitter chuckle escapes her pursed lips.{/n} "'You'... that sounds so strange, considering how many me's were made. Can you be sure you are talking to the same woman you were close to? For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラはしばらくの間、何も言わずにいた。それから、口をすぼめたまま苦笑を漏らす。{/n}「『あなた』…何人もの私が作られたってことを考えると、すごく奇妙に聞こえるわね。自分が話しているのが、親しくしていた女性と同じ存在だと確信できる？あなたが知っているのは、彼女の遺体をあそこに、異種族の檻の中に放置した。そこで私たちは死んで、何度も何度も冒涜的な生命として蘇った…」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈沉默了片刻，随后，她的嘴角发出了苦涩的笑声。{/n}“‘你’……这个称呼真的很古怪。毕竟有那么多我被创造了出来，你能确定，你面前的这个女人，就是你曾亲近过的那个女人吗？你也很清楚，你把她的尸体丢在了那里，丢在了异形的笼子里。我们在那里死亡，而又无数次被拖回了这充满亵渎的血肉之中……”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah says nothing for a while. Then, a bitter chuckle escapes her pursed lips.{/n} "'You'... that sounds so strange, considering how many me's were made. Can you be sure you are talking to the same woman you were close to? For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈沉默了片刻，随后，她的嘴角发出了苦涩的笑声。{/n}“‘你’……这个称呼真的很古怪。毕竟有那么多我被创造了出来，你能确定，你面前的这个女人，就是你曾亲近过的那个女人吗？你也很清楚，你把她的尸体丢在了那里，丢在了异形的笼子里。我们在那里死亡，而又无数次被拖回了这充满亵渎的血肉之中……”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah bleibt eine ganze Weile stumm. Dann entringt sich ein verbittertes Kichern ihren verzogenen Lippen.{/n} "'Ihr' ... das klingt merkwürdig, angesichts der vielen Ichs, die gemacht wurden. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr mit derselben Frau sprecht, der Ihr einst nahestandet? Soweit Ihr wisst, habt Ihr ihren Körper im Käfig des Xenon zurückgelassen, wo wir so viele Male gestorben sind und wieder zu profanem Leben erweckt wurden ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah says nothing for a while. Then, a bitter chuckle escapes her pursed lips.{/n} "'You'... that sounds so strange, considering how many me's were made. Can you be sure you are talking to the same woman you were close to? For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah bleibt eine ganze Weile stumm. Dann entringt sich ein verbittertes Kichern ihren verzogenen Lippen.{/n} "'Ihr' ... das klingt merkwürdig, angesichts der vielen Ichs, die gemacht wurden. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr mit derselben Frau sprecht, der Ihr einst nahestandet? Soweit Ihr wisst, habt Ihr ihren Körper im Käfig des Xenon zurückgelassen, wo wir so viele Male gestorben sind und wieder zu profanem Leben erweckt wurden ..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah garde le silence l'espace de quelques instants, puis un gloussement amer s'échappe de ses lèvres pincées.{/n} « Voilà une bien curieuse formulation, quand on sait combien de "moi" ont vu le jour. Comment pouvez-vous être {mf|sûr|sûre} que vous vous adressez à la femme dont vous étiez proche autrefois ? Pour autant que vous sachiez, vous avez abandonné son corps ici, dans la cage du xénos, où nous avons si souvent trouvé la mort avant de renaître à une vie profane... »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah says nothing for a while. Then, a bitter chuckle escapes her pursed lips.{/n} "'You'... that sounds so strange, considering how many me's were made. Can you be sure you are talking to the same woman you were close to? For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."

Comment pouvez-vous être {mf|sûr|sûre} que vous vous adressez à la femme dont vous étiez proche autrefois ? Pour autant que vous sachiez, vous avez abandonné son corps ici, dans la cage du xénos, où nous avons si souvent trouvé la mort avant de renaître à une vie profane... »

Can you be sure you are talking to the same woman you were close to? For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Sonra büzülü dudaklarından acı bir kahkaha dökülüyor.{/n} "'Benimle' demek... Kulağa acayip gelmiyor mu? Sonuçta o kadar çok 'ben' oldu ki. Gerçekten o yakınlaştığın kadınla konuştuğundan nasıl emin olabiliyorsun? Belki de kaç kez ölüp günahkâr bir yaşama dirildiğimiz o zeno kafesinde bırakmışsındır cesedini, kim bilir..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah says nothing for a while. Then, a bitter chuckle escapes her pursed lips.{/n} "'You'... that sounds so strange, considering how many me's were made. Can you be sure you are talking to the same woman you were close to? For all you know, you left her body lying there, in the xenos's cage, where we died and rose to profane life so many times over..."
